sqlMap.statement: SELECT NVL( ( SELECT MGT_DT FROM DT_MGT WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DT_MGT_PGM_ID = #dtMgtPgmId# AND DT_PROC_CD = #dtProcCdBatch# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) , ( SELECT MGT_DT FROM DT_MGT WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DT_MGT_PGM_ID = #dtMgtPgmIdAst# AND DT_PROC_CD = #dtProcCdBatch# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) ) MNG_INTFC_DT FROM DUAL
